text: Do you know that these were debunked as being high criteria for SEO sometime ago?

the connected social account pixels that come with HubSpot are a bit of a nuisance, I use Tag Manager on HS sites to control this, but I am not 1000% sure of the ramifications if for example you need paid social tracking and your template/Tag Manager code does not report that information.

i'm currently checking out the HubSpot CMS for evaluation for a client, but I guess I am looking at a similar thing to you. Are you basically asking can you make your HubSpot website a PWA? e.g. use HubL as a content management system? Or... query 3rd party APIs?
